description: Deletes a batch of items owned or administered by the calling user. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/#/Delete_Items/02r30000008r000000/
title: deleteItems

results.description: An array of JSON objects, one for each item requested. Each object is made up of the itemId and a success flag to indicate if the item was successfully deleted. If an error occurs when deleting an item, an error object is also returned.

itemId.description: The ID of the deleted item

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

error.description: If an error occurs, and error object is also returned
